name: Horse Color Genetics
description:
A collaborative app where you edit a horse's genes and observe the effects on its coat color.

This is a collaborative version of an app by Jennifer Hoffman. Original app: https://horse.jenniferhoffman.net/horse-color-genetics.html. Since the original app is CC-BY-NC-SA-3.0 licensed, so is this version.

The demo comes in two versions, standalone and multi-file. Standalone bundles all assets (including images) into a single file, which you can download below and use without access to this server. This has better longevity, but is 20MB and loads slowly. Multi-file instead fetches images from this server, so it requires a network connection and this server's existence.
author: Collabs contributors; artwork and original code by Jennifer Hoffman
